attributes.action: Abolish the draconian law that prevents the sale of methylated spirits on a Sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I recently attempted to buy some methylated spirit from my
local DIY chain store.  I needed it for my camping stove.  I was told by a member of staff that the store couldn't sell me
the stuff because it was a Sunday!  The law that prevents the sale of meths on a Sunday should be repealed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
